live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
47588.summary: Some customers in the Lower Mount Royal area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
47588.title: Mar 11 - Calgary (Lower Mount Royal) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
